properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-type
properties.description: The type support with kerberos authentication.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.client-config
properties.description: The path of using client configuration file for authentication.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.name
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, the login module name.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.control-flag
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, the login module control flag.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.store-key
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether store key.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.do-not-prompt
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether do or not prompt.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.use-ticket-cache
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether use ticket cache.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.use-key-tab
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether use debug.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.ticket-cache-name
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, the name of ticket cache.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.key-tab-name
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, the name of key-tab.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.principal
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, the authentication principal name.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.use-first-pass
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether use first pass.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.try-first-pass
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether try first pass.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.store-pass
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether store pass.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.clear-pass
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether clear pass.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.refresh
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether refresh kerberos config

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.renew
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether new TGT.

properties.name: spring.kerberos.login-module.initiator
properties.description: The custom login-module configuration, whether is or not initiator.
